quotes: Evans won the 1995 Grawemeyer Award for Ideas Improving World Order
for his fall 1994 Foreign Policy article, 'Cooperative Security and Intra-State Conflict'
On 11 June 2012, Evans was named a Companion of the Order of Australia
He had previously been made an Officer of the Order of Australia (AO) in 2001
